MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Barrland Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.30pm. Our engineers have arrived at Barrland substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.34pm on Friday 18 December 2020.
